question: The chart shows daily social media usage time by platform (hours). Which statement is correct according to the chart data?

options.A: Instagram users spend more than 3 hours per day on average.
options.B: TikTok is used slightly longer than YouTube.
options.C: Twitter is the second-most used platform.

explanation: Labels show TikTok at 1.9h and YouTube at 1.5h, so TikTok is slightly higher (B). The bars use heights not proportional to hours, which may make A seem plausible even though Instagram is 2.8h (<3h).
